data.title: Brasilian serenata by Dori Caymmi Paulinho Da Costa Jimmy Johnson Scott, CD with christofchristof
data.meta_description: CD - Original used - NM/VG+ - Qwest Records, Warner Bros. Records - WPCP 4349, 926573-2, 4349 - Japan - 1991 -  promo prssing!! cd shows a few superfial scuffs, but plays without problems. booklet,additional booklet and inlay look like new!! comes with original obi!! (see my pic) -  - 1 	Amazon River 	5:48 - 2 	Tres Curumins 	3:55 - 3 	The Colors Of Joy 	3:55 - 4 	Mercador De Siri 	3:32 - 5 	Ninho de Vespa 	3:35 - 6 	Toucan's Dance 	3:31 - 7 	Flower Of Bahia 	4:05 - 8 	Você Ja Foi A Bahia? 	3:17 - 9 	Medley: To My Father / Pescaria 	3:56 - 10 	Historia Antiga 	3:43 - 11 	Medley: The Desert / The Wraith 	4:07 - 12 	Amazon River (Reprise) 	2:02 -  -     Alto Saxophone – Tom Scott (tracks: 5) -     Art Direction – Jeri Heiden -     Backing Vocals – Carmin Twilly (tracks: 1, 2), Carol Rogers (tracks: 4, 5, 7, 8), Clydene Jackson-Edwards (tracks: 1, 2), Darlene Koldenhoven (tracks: 1, 2), Kate Markowitz (tracks: 4, 5, 7, 8), Kevyn Lettau (tracks: 4, 5, 7, 8), Morgan Ames (tracks: 1, 2) -     Bass – Abraham Laboriel (tracks: 3, 4, 6), Jerry Watts (tracks: 1, 2, 5), James Johnson (tracks: 7 to 11) -     Bassoon – Ray Pizzi (tracks: 2, 9) -     Design – Linda Cobb -     Drums – Claudio Slon (tracks: 7 to 11), Michael Shapiro (tracks: 1 to 6) -     Executive Producer – Louise Velasquez -     Flute - Tom Scott (tracks: 1) -     Keyboards – Don Grusin (tracks: 1, 2, 7, 9, 11), Freddie Ravel (tracks: 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10) -     Painting – Joel Nakamura -     Percussion – Paulinho Da Costa (tracks: 1 to 8, 12) -     Photography By – Diego Uchitel -     Piano – Don Grusin (tracks: 8) -     Producer, Arranged By, Liner Notes, Acoustic Guitar, Vocals – Dori Caymmi -     Trombone – Bill Watrous (tracks: 6) -  - Comes with 12 page booklet and additional japanese fold-out insert.
